snippet: Alexandre Tharaud, a pianist from France, brought several selections from a recent recordings and from a forthcoming album to a performance at Le Poisson Rouge.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by pianist Alexandre Tharaud at Le Poisson Rouge.
lead_paragraph: Alexandre Tharaud, a pianist from France, brought several selections from a recent recordings and from a forthcoming album to a performance at Le Poisson Rouge.

headline.seo: Alexandre Tharaud, Pianist, at Le Poisson Rouge
headline.main: So Riveting You Might Have Heard a Fork Drop
headline.print_headline: So Riveting You Might Have Heard A Fork Drop
